conclusion: Understand how position and size of shadows change with light source movement
Shadows are labeled A, B, C, and D, cast by objects on the ground
Light source is positioned to cast shadows on the ground
Light source is coming from the left side of the image
Shadows cast by objects are labeled A, B, C, and D
Shadows will shift when the light source moves
Shadow size and position change based on new light source position
Shadow of the apple will move to a new position
Shadow of the white paper will move to a new position
Shadow of the chicken leg will move to a new position
Shadow of the apple will move to a new position
Shadows will move to the back right
Final answer: Shadow of the apple will move to the back right
